Text: It could just be my video player but the audio and video are not in sync.

This is badly out of sync. If you have a decent player (MPC, VLC...), you need to input a time shift of (+)2800 ms (2,8 seconds) for a perfect audio-video sync.

Also, the picture is crappy but watchable in a pinch.
works fine for me.  thanks. please, please keep posting
